qas.question: What year did season ten of American Idol first air?
In which season of American Idol did Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez become judges?
Who replace weekly mentors as a more permanent mentor on American Idols tenth season?
What show did Simon Cowell join after leaving American Idol?
Who was the executive producer of American Idols tenth season?
Who returned as executive producer this season?
Which two new judges joined Randy Jackson on the judges' panel?
Who was the in-house mentor this season?

context: Season <a1_0>ten<a1_0/> of the series premiered on <a5_0>January 19, <a0_0>2011<a5_0/><a0_0/>. Many changes were introduced this season, from the format to the personnel of the show. <a7_0>Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler<a7_0/> joined Randy Jackson as judges following the departures of Simon Cowell (who left to launch the U.S. version of <a3_0>The X Factor<a3_0/>), Kara DioGuardi (whose contract was not renewed) and Ellen DeGeneres, while <a4_0><a6_0>Nigel Lythgoe<a6_0/><a4_0/> returned as executive producer. <a2_0><a8_0>Jimmy Iovine<a8_0/><a2_0/>, chairman of the Interscope Geffen A&M label group, the new partner of American Idol, acted as the in-house mentor in place of weekly guest mentors, although in later episodes special guest mentors such as Beyoncé, will.i.am and Lady Gaga were brought in.
